abstract: IGA Worldwide netted $25 million in Series B fuding in a round led by KTB Ventures and Peacock Equity, a joint venture between General Electric Media, Communications and Entertainment and NBC Universal.
lead_paragraph: IGA Worldwide netted $25 million in Series B fuding in a round led by KTB Ventures and Peacock Equity, a joint venture between General Electric Media, Communications and Entertainment and NBC Universal.
